remarks: A necessary and sufficient condition for a Kuratowski ordered pair to be a relation.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2008.)  (Avoid depending on this detail.)
statement:
relop.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
relop.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
relop $p |- ( Rel <. A , B >. <-> E. x E. y ( A = { x } /\ B = { x , y } ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
